description:
Zagan settles into life with his new family. For and Raphael settle into an entirely new dynamic living at the castle together. On an outing with Nephy and For, he encounters an ancient sorcerous device in need of repair.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Music at Night Is Lovely, but May Be Too Much When You`re Socially Awkward
Tsukiyo no Ongakukai wa Utsukushii ga, Komyu Shou ni wa Mada Hayai
Un bal est une chose plaisante, mais pas pour un introverti
月夜の音楽会は美しいが, コミュ障にはまだ早い
